es.uvigo.esei.amchartsJava.core.api.guides

Interface IGuideRadarChartController

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IGuideController
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GuideRadarChartController

    public interface IGuideRadarChartController
extends IGuideController
    Interface for GuideRadarChartController. This interface contains properties of guide only used by radarChart. Details of Guide and its properties in AmCharts API.
    Author:
    Iago Fernández Cuñarro
